description: This file is the entry point for a React-based web application, setting up the root rendering element and rendering the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React node for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot().render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the specified root container.

methods.name: document.getElementById
methods.description: Retrieves DOM element by its ID to serve as the root container for React.
